price: Deɛ wͻka nesε: “Yεnnye wo nni gyesε woma nsuo pue fri asaase no mu ma no buso ma yεn;
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū lan nu'mina laka ḥattā tafjura lanā mina al-arḍi yanbūʿan
